content: p2tog row 4 k 5 sts row 5 color change if desired end of heel p 03 blue sky fibers step no 2 finishing weave in ends and close up any gaps created at the heal block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang abbreviations bor beginning of round rs right side co cast on sl slip k knit ssk slip slip knit slip 2 k2tog knit 2 stitches together stitches separately knitwise insert left needle in front of 2 m marker slipped stitches knit 2 slipped p purl stitches together pm place marker st s stitch es rem remaining * repeat the directions between repeat repeat the asterisks as many times as round s round s indicated p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2024 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 10012024 p 05
